data.name: RichTextBox2.Text
data.value:
Use this button if you are not able to restore the origial DLL. Error: Sharing Violation or some other possible errors.
Most of the time it is not required to restart the Windows, but if you required then you may!

data.name: RichTextBox4.Text
data.value:
Note: Backup should be done only one time if you are a new user! Do not use this button more than once! Doing so will backup modified DLL if not restored properly. Only use this button after a New Windows Update (a new windows update may update those DLLs, please verify that manually!).
Warning: If you messed up something you will notice that your MS Store will not download any app or update any app.
Fix: Only a full Windows RE Install.
⚠️ procedure to do a proper backup of DLLS: 1. Click the button on the new method (Backup Stock DLL) Button. 2. Press yes to backup 3. Press any key to continue. 4. Wait for 5 seconds 5. Press y 2 times. 6. Close the Cmd or it will close automatically.

data.name: RichTextBox3.Text
data.value:
This button will replace the modified DLL with stock DLL, after which your minecraft will work.
Note: Do not use this button without doing stock DLL backup, if already done at the beginning do not touch the Backup button.
How to know if the Bypass loaded successfully?: If your cmd outputs you: System32\Windows.ApplicationModel.Store.dll 1 File(s) copied sysWOW64\Windows.ApplicationModel.Store.dll 1 File(s) copied This means that the Bypass loaded successfully!
Else it will outputs you: Sharing violation or Other possible Error!
